title: 원어민 반응 - 의심과 회의
description: 자연스러운 의심과 회의를 표현하는 원어민 수준의 반응 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: Really? I'm a bit skeptical about that...
Hmm, is that really true? I'm not entirely convinced.
Doesn't that seem a bit odd? Something doesn't add up.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 의심과 회의 표현 구사

sentences.en: Really? I'm a bit skeptical about that...

sentences.kr: 음, 그게 사실일까? 확신이 안 서네.
sentences.en: Hmm, is that really true? I'm not entirely convinced.

sentences.kr: 좀 이상하지 않아? 뭔가 석연치 않아.
sentences.en: Doesn't that seem a bit odd? Something doesn't add up.

sentences.kr: 그런 것 같기도 하고... 하지만 확실하지 않아.
sentences.en: It might seem that way... but I'm not so sure.

sentences.kr: 글쎄, 과연 그럴까? 좀 더 신중하게 봐야 할 것 같아.
sentences.en: Well, I wonder about that. We should probably look at it more carefully.
For real? That sounds a bit exaggerated to me.

sentences.kr: 그럴 수도 있겠지만, 뭔가 빠뜨린 게 있는 것 같아.
sentences.en: That could be, but I feel like we're missing something.

sentences.kr: 확신해도 돼? 좀 더 확인해볼 필요가 있을 것 같은데.
sentences.en: Are you sure about that? I think we might need to double-check.
